name: Cold Night
description:
Story

Your Are an Army Veteran living Ur Retired Life 

Meanwhile, During the Cold War

The soviet Union is Thinking to Use Bots(There is not need for logic)

So for A test They Sent it To A misson It Work Perfectly

So They made A factory But When It was Making Some Bots Went Haywire

And Escaped Lucky No one was hurt And the Bot did not have Guns Only a Knife 

Now this is were U come in U must fight off 3 waves of Bots to prevent the destruction of your house and the village nearby So U  ready?.

Other Stuff

So this is my First time join A game jam so if there is some kind of Problem Please Say it (Most of the sprites are made by me and music is made using Beepbox and Sounds effect are made by sfxr)
